homeLanguage.homeSolutionText: One Stop Financial Solutions for Personal & Business
homeLanguage.homeSolutionTextParagraph: Take control of all your financial goals for the future with the most convenient app, right in one dashboard, right at your fingertips.

homeSliderMedia.homeSliderMediaSAW: “KoinWorks utilizes a suitable business model for Indonesia because it helps build enterprises and deliver solutions that impact people's lives.” - Tech in Asia
homeSliderMedia.homeSliderMediaKontan: “Seeing that almost every SMEs have adopted digital market, this is a market potential that KoinWorks has been focusing on where the company aims to have financial inclusion in the country.” - e27
homeSliderMedia.homeSliderMediaKompas: “By leveraging machine learning, KoinWorks offers low-interest loans for borrowers while promising better returns for lenders.” - Kr-asia.com
homeSliderMedia.homeSliderMediaInvestor: “The idea of KoinWorks is to cater to small and medium businesses where a majority of the players are still unbanked and underbanked.” - DealStreetAsia

homeTrustedSuperApp.homeTrustedHeading: The First and Trusted Super Financial App in Indonesia
homeTrustedSuperApp.homeTrustedParagraph: Used and loved by more than 300.000 users who are closer to their financial goals. Now, it’s your turn! Download and get started.

homeFinancialChoices.homeFinancialChoicesHeading: Helping You Make Smart Financial Choices
homeFinancialChoices.homeFinancialDescriptionOne: Easily access your personal and business financial needs in one convenient place, just a few taps away.
homeFinancialChoices.homeFinancialDescriptionTwo: No matter where you are or what you are doing, connect seamlessly anytime, anywhere.
homeFinancialChoices.homeFinancialDescriptionThree: Start lending from IDR100.000 or get responsible loans to achieve your financial dreams.
homeFinancialChoices.homeFinancialDescriptionFour: Just sit and relax, let us take care all of your financial needs.

homeProductKoinworks.homeProductKoinworksDescription: We are uniting you and your financial needs in one super app.
homeProductKoinworks.homeProductKoinworksDescKoinRobo: Automatically diversified your portfolio and get fixed return while making social impact to others.
homeProductKoinworks.homeProductKoinworksP2p: Start lending and make meaningful action with as little as Rp100,000, get EAR from 18% p.a.
homeProductKoinworks.homeProductKoinBisnis: Where SMEs can get hassle-free financing up to Rp2 billion with no collateral, within 1 day!

homeHowToUseKoinworks.homeHowToUseKoinworksDescriptionSlideOne: Available on Google Play and Play Store, For Free.
homeHowToUseKoinworks.homeHowToUseKoinworksDescriptionSlideTwo: Super simple procedure. Just tell us basic details about you and/or your business.
homeHowToUseKoinworks.homeHowToUseKoinworksDescriptionSlideThr: Be a Lender to grow your assets with ease then earn returns or get financed for personal & business needs as a Borrower or even be both at once, it's yours to decide
homeHowToUseKoinworks.homeHowToUseKoinworksHeadingFour: You’re all set to enjoy our new financial experience!
